hypothesis: Chris Brown has been featured on multiple albums.
premise: + Chris Brown + In addition to his solo commercial success , Brown has been featured on several singles such as `` No Air '' , a duet with singer Jordin Sparks , `` Shortie like Mine '' with the rapper Bow Wow and `` Shawty Get Loose '' alongside Lil Mama and T-Pain . + Shawty Get Loose + `` Shawty Get Loose '' is the third single from hip hop artist Lil Mama 's debut album , VYP : Voice of the Young People . + No Air + `` No Air '' is a song by American recording artist Jordin Sparks and American R&B singer/actor Chris Brown . + No Air + It was released in the United States on February 11 , 2008 and serves as the second single from her self-titled debut album .
explanation_1: Chris Brown has been featured on multiple albums, including " No Air " with Jordin Sparks, " Shawty Get Loose " with Lil Mama and T-Pain and " Shortie like Mine " with Bow Wow.
